amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the F-22 fighter program by $420 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of July 28, 1997, to reduce funding appropriated in the bill for research and development for the F-22 fighter aircraft by $420 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
